#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              int m,w,c,cap;
              cin>>cap>>m>>w>>c;
              w=min(w,2*m); //max w
              c=min(c,4*(w+m)); //max c
              c=min(c,4*cap/5); 
              cap-=c;
              w=min(w,2*cap/3);
              cap-=w;
              m=min(m,cap);
                             
              cout<<m<<" "<<w<<" "<<c<<endl;     
    }
    return 0;
}
